content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":603828,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/879a91c0-76a5-4d2a-b88c-dd940d690587/10808.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/879a91c0-76a5-4d2a-b88c-dd940d690587/10808.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10808.jpg\",\"name\":\"10808.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"879a91c0-76a5-4d2a-b88c-dd940d690587\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":655,\"height\":207},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"MS Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome to the first module of the Certification for Technical Interview Mentors program. We highly appreciate your desire to contribute to the TI Certification process by providing your assistance and sharing your experience with future Technical Interviewers.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"MS Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please remember that \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"MS Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Become Certified Technical Interviewer 3.0 \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"MS Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"program is mentee-driven and does not provide any dedicated mentor supervision.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"MS Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\"}}}]}]}]}}"
